Text: Thank YouSkilling Thank you so much for delivering my resume to your Associate Program recruiting personnel I have been in contact with them for the last couple weeks and recently confirmed an interview date for Wednesday May rd I am very excited about the possibility of joining Enron and look forward to a challenging visit next week It would be an honor to become a member of your prestigious team Again I greatly appreciate your time and assistance You have been a great help Have a wonderful week and congratulations on all your continued success Sincerely Jon Friedberg Villa Costera Malibu CA Phone Email onFriedbergcom
